FuncDef:
The tunnel retrans-queue command configures the maximum number of concurrent L2TP sessions allowed for an L2TP tunnel. Excess session requests are denied.
The undo tunnel retrans-queue command deletes the configured maximum number of concurrent L2TP sessions allowed for an L2TP tunnel.
By default, the maximum number of concurrent L2TP sessions allowed for an L2TP tunnel is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the maximum number of L2TP negotiation sessions in an L2TP tunnel at a specified time.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1024.

ExtraInfo: To prevent L2TP session negotiation packets in an L2TP tunnel from exhausting the buffer, run the tunnel retrans-queue command so that only a limited number of L2TP sessions can be established.
